text: Kandi ba bandi twahaye ibitabo (abaje kwemera muri bo) bishimira ibyo wahishuriwe (Qur’an, kuko ihuje n’ibyo bafite mu bitabo byabo), ariko hari n’udutsiko muri bo duhakana bimwe muri byo. Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mu by’ukuri nategetswe kugaragira Allah (wenyine) no kutagira ibyo mubangikanya na byo. Nanahamagarira (abantu) kumugana, kandi iwe ni ho garukiro ryanjye.”
